1341020.name: Visciple29er Demo
1341020.description:
Visciple29er Demo is a demo version of a face tracking application that uses face detection technology.

It operates as a pseudo controller and can be used as a XInput general purpose device.

It tells the pseudo controller the yaw, pitch, roll, distance, lean, and estimated gaze coordinates from the face position.

Assignment:
Yaw: Right analog stick X
Pitch: Right analog stick Y
Roll: Analog trigger LR
Distance: Left analog stick Y
Lean: Left analog stick X
Pupil：HAT switch
